thread.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger mocks Trump for his record-low approval ratings
thread.title_full: Arnold Schwarzenegger mocks Trump for his record-low approval ratings - Business Insider

author: Lisa de Moraes, Deadline
title: Arnold Schwarzenegger mocks Trump for his record-low approval ratings
text:
Getty Images
When Arnold Schwarzenegger was Donald Trump ’s replacement as host of " Celebrity Apprentice ," t he President of the United States liked to mock Arnold’s ratings whenever possible, including at the National Prayer Breakfast.
Now that Schwarzenegger’s done with the reality competition series and says he won’t be back , he’s returning the compliment, mocking Trump’s lousy approval ratings, which got even worse when his skinny budget was revealed, showing plans to eliminate after-school programs and even Meals on Wheels :
Hey, @realDonaldTrump , I have some advice. See you at Hart Middle School? Here's more info about #afterschool : https://t.co/NOgdhBHyyp pic.twitter.com/NQI2OdVqtF
— Arnold (@Schwarzenegger) March 21, 2017 Read the original article on Deadline . Copyright 2017. Follow Deadline on Twitter .
